summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1577, for the improvement of North and West Eightieth Street; North and West Eighty-first Street; North and West Eighty-second Street; North and West Eighty-third Street; and North and West Eighty-fourth Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Third Avenue Northwest; and Greenwood Avenue from North Eightieth Street to North Eighty-fifth Street, by laying water mains therein, together with all necessary appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 16842, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
